job_history.work_description: Maintain the appearance of equipment utilized throughout the day. Managing daily operation while driving safety policies. Directly responsible for overseeing 8 to 24 zone leaders. Communicated, trained and pushed operational changes as directed. Maintained healthy working environment while working in busy atmosphere. Maintained and provided daily schedule to dispatchers and senior leaders. Attended Delta shift briefing regularly in effort to communicate expectations for the day and address any possible concern raised by Delta staff. Addressed overall concourse operation concerns. Fulfill customer request regularly, in a timely manner. Provide daily huddle and direction to staff in preparation for daily operation. Coach and counsel employees. Recognize employees. Diffuse situations. Challenge delays. Maintain effective operational performance. Revamp processes when necessary. Provide leadership to employees daily. Provide hands on team work. Focus-drive on dress code policy and employee professionalism. Communicate daily with Client, management and key positioned employees involved in the daily operation. Drive customer satisfaction results.

Managed 10 to 14 team of 3 man employees. Managed up to 35 team leaders directly. Responsible for building 7 day schedule for employees. Responsible for coaching, counseling and documenting employees. Managed an entire concourse from the ramp. Communicated and managed dispatcher. Responsible for providing dispatcher with staff in effort to turn aircraft during day time turn operation. Responsible for managing processes regarding CBP. Responsible for controlling operation failures. Pushed safety policies regularly.

Assistant manager in scheduling employees. Execute directives provided leadership. Support team leaders with assistant on aircraft as needed. Continuously provide safety patrol on the ramp and concourse daily. Held briefing to communicate information pasted down by management. Train employees to become team leaders and service aircraft.

Maintain the appearance of equipment utilized in operations. Assistant manager in scheduling employees. Execute directives provided leadership. Support team leaders with assistant on aircraft as needed. Continuously provide safety patrol on the ramp and concourse daily. Held briefing to communicate information pasted down by management. Train employees to become team leaders and service aircraft.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in leadership roles, including managing teams of up to 24 zone leaders and 35 team leaders, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Operations Management
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in managing daily operations, including maintaining equipment, overseeing staff, and driving safety policies, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Proven ability to manage and lead teams of varying sizes, including coaching, counseling, and developing employees, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Strong communication skills, including regular briefings, daily huddles, and communication with clients, management, and staff, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Ability to address operational concerns, diffuse situations, and challenge delays, indicating strong proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Experience in managing daily schedules, including creating 7-day schedules for employees and providing dispatchers with staff, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Safety Management
skills.explanation: Strong emphasis on safety policies and regular safety patrols, indicating strong proficiency in safety management.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Experience in fulfilling customer requests in a timely manner, indicating a solid working proficiency in customer service.
